cast.overview: Using massive piloted robots to combat the alien threat, earth's survivors take the fight to the invading alien force lurking in the depths of the Pacific Ocean. Nearly defenseless in the face of the relentless enemy, the forces of mankind have no choice but to turn to two unlikely heroes who now stand as earth's final hope against the mounting apocalypse.
cast.title: Pacific Rim

cast.original_title: Believe Me: The Abduction of Lisa McVey
cast.overview: On the night she plans on taking her own life, 17-year-old 'Lisa McVey' is kidnapped and finds herself fighting to stay alive and manages to be a victim of rape. She manages to talk her attacker into releasing her, but when she returns home, no one believes her story except for one detective, who suspects she was abducted by a serial killer. Based on horrifying true events.
cast.title: Believe Me: The Abduction of Lisa McVey

details.biography: Milton Barnes is a classically trained actor who has been applying his craft both on stage and on screen for over 20 years. Starting his career in theatre, Barnes has worked with The Stratford Festival of Canada, Canadian Stage, and The Company Theatre. On screen, some of Barnes’ most recent credits include Saving Hope, The Expanse, Private Eyes, and Suits. Look for him in the upcoming shows In Contempt, The Beaverton, and Cardinal.
details.name: Milton Barnes
